Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; exterior: painted decoration consisting of possibly part of siren scales and wing with added red remaining) to right; inscription on interior.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the subject matter, see Lemos no. 675 from Pitane. Provenance from Gardner pl. XXI
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 252, no. 388, pl. 55)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 679, no. 382)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0197) (phase 2)
